title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: If you’ve been watching the crypto startup industry closely, in the last year, you may have noticed a striking theme among many of the newly launched projects — a large chunk of them are launchpads designed to launch other new projects! As you might expect, this has caused somewhat a recursive series of events, where most newly launched launchpads start launching other launchpads!You might want to invest in a launchpad project for two reasons. The first and most common is because you want to gain access to the projects launched via the platform. The second is because you believe the launchpad’s native token will appreciate in value — or sometimes both. Launchpads like AdLunam aims to make a dent in this crypto universe with their unique attention ranking model based on Engage-To-Earn concept.Learn more: Adlunam.cc"

comments.author: Gopinaganpally
comments.body: Quote from: sagarbansal21 on June 10, 2022, 06:49:56 AMIf you’ve been watching the crypto startup industry closely, in the last year, you may have noticed a striking theme among many of the newly launched projects — a large chunk of them are launchpads designed to launch other new projects! As you might expect, this has caused somewhat a recursive series of events, where most newly launched launchpads start launching other launchpads!You might want to invest in a launchpad project for two reasons. The first and most common is because you want to gain access to the projects launched via the platform. The second is because you believe the launchpad’s native token will appreciate in value — or sometimes both. Launchpads like AdLunam aims to make a dent in this crypto universe with their unique attention ranking model based on Engage-To-Earn concept.Learn more: Adlunam.cc"
